course_title: Topics: Environmental Studies: Vector Ecology & Control
class_notes: Students in the BS/MPH ENVS/RSPH 4+1 program, who have not already taken ENVS 359, must take this course as part of their 4+1 BS/MPH program.
course_description: Variable topics that are offered as irregular courses. Past course topics have included: Finding Place: Technology, Stories, and the Environment; Introduction to Botany; Environment, Health, and Development; Conservation and Development; Booms and Busts in Resources of Georgia; and Paleoecology.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 3053, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Clennon, Status: Open
